about_the_game:
Add a shining rainbow palace to your game! Grab this Winged Unicorn tileset for RPG Maker!

This Unicorn Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Multiple water tiles
Cloud tiles, for high-flying palaces
Floor tiles with purple marble, white marble, rainbow checker, gold brick, Moroccan tile in gold and purple, and a gold decorative edge
Extra cloud details
spike traps
Lilypads

Walls:

Wall tiles in purple marble, white marble, gold brick, tile, rainbow checker, and more to match the flooring. Includes matching roofs for all wall types.

Also featuring:

stairs to match flooring
small accent pillars
large accent pillars (plain and themed)
plain arch
detailed arch
raised platform
coordinated throne
magical-looking window (small and large)
treasure box (with animated version)
push block
bridge rails
multiple statues – large and small
magic rings
rainbow sparkle trail
large rainbow circle with faded end tiles
rainbow pillar lights
diagonal stairs
3 designs of ladders
beaded rainbow wall decor
matching jewels
sky parallax
plus more!

Events and Animations:

Rainbow treasure chest, rainbow fire and sparkle animations!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
